verses.text: \w If|strong="H3884"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* side, \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*,

\w if|strong="H3884"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* side, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* men \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*,

then they would have \w swallowed|strong="H1104"\w* \w us|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, when \w their|strong="H1104"\w* wrath was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w us|strong="H1104"\w*,

\w then|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w would|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H4325"\w* \w overwhelmed|strong="H7857"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w stream|strong="H5158"\w* \w would|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H4325"\w* \w gone|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w proud|strong="H2121"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w would|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w gone|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*.

Our \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w has|strong="H5315"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* \w like|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* \w out|strong="H4422"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* fowler’s \w snare|strong="H6341"\w*. \w The|strong="H7665"\w* \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* have \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H5828"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.
